extends java.lang.Object
    Some utils about database like getting or creating database.

      • getReadableDatabase

        public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getReadableDatabase(android.content.Context context,
                                                         java.lang.String databaseName)
                                                           throws android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException
        Open a database which is used for reading only. If the database is not exists,the method will create a database from the assetscopyDatabase(android.content.Context, java.io.File, String).
        参数:
        context -
        databaseName -
        返回:
        抛出:
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException

      • getWritableDatabase

        public android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getWritableDatabase(android.content.Context context,
                                                         java.lang.String databaseName)
        Open a database which is used for both reading and writing. If the database is not exists,the method will create a database from the assetscopyDatabase(android.content.Context, java.io.File, String).
        参数:
        context -
        databaseName -
        返回:
